Articles.Content:
I don't think this has been brought up yet, so I'd like to suggest all action groups have a hold or pulse setting that would make them behave as the brake group does currently. 

This is something I've wanted for a while, but it seems extra relevant now that there are things like stock air brakes, and it would be nice to have more than one key to bind them to. Shouldn't require any changes to parts, they just use the toggle on/off action.

Thoughts?
Good idea! And with adjustable timers, and with adjustable timers that can be modified using other action groups!
